pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generate Mind Maps with R // Convert Markdown ('.md') or R Markdown ('.Rmd') texts, R scripts, and directory structures, into mind map widgets or files ('.mm'), and vice versa. "FreeMind" mind map ('.mm') files can be opened by or imported to common mindmap software such as 'FreeMind' (http://freemind.sourceforge.net/wiki/index.php/Main_Page).
